column4: Hey everyone. I'm trying to install ubuntu netbook 10.10 on my aspire d260. I did the USB installer on my windows computer and now when I try to boot off my netbook it just hangs on SYSLINUX 3.82 ect. any ideas?
Did you use unetbootin or another tool?
not sure what tool actually, just the executable on the netbook cd.
Sorry if you already answered this but I got disconnected. Does the USB drive boot on any other machine?
